original_text: For to this end Christ both died, and rose, and revived, that he might be Lord both of the dead and living.
korean_text: 이를 위하여 그리스도께서 죽었다가 다시 살아나셨으니 곧 죽은 자와 산 자의 주가 되려 하심이라

sentences.original_text: For to this end Christ both died
that he might be Lord both of the dead and living
sentences.korean_translation: 죽은 자와 산 자의 주가 되시려 함이라
